qas.question: What town did Beyonce go to school in?

context: Beyoncé attended St. Mary's Elementary School in <a0_0><a7_0>Fredericksburg<a7_0/><a0_0/>, Texas, where she enrolled in dance classes. Her singing talent was discovered when <a3_0>dance instructor <a1_0><a8_0>Darlette Johnson<a8_0/><a3_0/><a1_0/> began humming a song and she finished it, able to hit the high-pitched notes. Beyoncé's interest in music and performing continued after winning a school talent show at age <a9_0>seven<a9_0/>, singing John Lennon's "<a6_0>Imagine<a6_0/>" to beat 15/16-year-olds. In fall of 1990, Beyoncé enrolled in Parker Elementary School, a <a5_0>music magnet school<a5_0/> in <a2_0>Houston<a2_0/>, where she would perform with the school's choir. She also attended the High School for the Performing and Visual Arts and later Alief Elsik High School. Beyoncé was also a member of the choir at <a4_0><a10_0>St. John's United Methodist Church<a10_0/><a4_0/> as a soloist for two years.
